data.text: @Biochem_Journal @dbkell It bears similarities to other post-viral syndromes, and to myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome (ME/CFS).

@TimoStrotmann @Biochem_Journal @LongDeutschland Note that the previous study was not an RCT. Lots of folk are however gearing to try and get the ethics to do such a trial. One at https://t.co/eQ5RWolqmw
@Biochem_Journal @LongDeutschland @dbkell Has a larger study already been started to investigate the effectiveness of the treatment with anticoagulants?
